extendedInfo.description: A FIRST OF ITS KIND ANIMATION SERIES IS NOW AVAILABLE ON YOUR MOBILE DEVICE!âElectric Cityâ, is a thought provoking 20- episode web series created by Tom Hanks.  The inter-woven storylines and vivid animation combine with a compelling score to that will immerse you into the world of the Electric City!Follow of the adventures of Cleveland Carr, Hope Chatsworth, Frank Deetleman, Loman, Mikaela and many more as they unravel mysteries and fight for their survival.TOM HANKSâ ELECTRIC CITY - THE APPThe App offers multiple sections where users can stream or download the 20 episode animation series and the exclusive graphic novels. Learn more about the characters, and go behind the scenes to see the making of Electric City.KEY FEATURES:â¢Animation Series Episodes: Online streaming and HD quality downloads. Treasure the beautiful landscapes in the Gallery sectionâ¢COMICS: Download and gain exclusive access to the Graphic Novels, two prequels only available in this app.  â¢Character Bios: Read about the charactersâ back-stories along with a picture gallery.â¢Behind The Scenes: Learn more about Electric City from the series-creator, Tom Hanks.â¢Games: Know more about the games based on this series.The App is free to download and gives a sneak peak into the series along with other free content.  The full series and the comics are available for in-app purchase.

reviews.title: Wonderful!
reviews.comment: I found this to be wonderful! It was thought provoking as well as entertaining!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love the show, but the app doesn\'t work.
reviews.comment: Can\'t get the app to load past the \"rate this app\" pop up.
reviews.author: Jason Peterson

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: WARNING!!  Suggested veiwing of ages 17+ #####  Awsome work great on my Nabi 2 tablet.  Very fluent with picture swiping and overall movement in app. First episode of app is free then you pay for the rest. In this app you get>>> 1st part free in HD### gives bios to all charictors### Picture gallery for each charictor### 2 behind the scenes videos by Tom Hanks### Links to download comics and other apps from the world of electric city
reviews.author: Mike Biggs

reviews.title: Ummm
reviews.comment: I keeps cutting off never made it pass the content download!
reviews.author: Jeremy Poet Sanders

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: But it keeps freezing. Have to restart app after each episode
reviews.author: Wi Re

reviews.title: Great series with extras.
reviews.comment: Electric City is a fantastic web series with a unique setting: a post apocolypse noir in a surprisingly green metropolis. The app itself mostly links to content that needs to be purchased, but I found the prices resonable and the content enjoyable. Check the show out on yahoo for free to see if the Electric City is a place you\'d like to visit, I\'m glad I did.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: 5 bucks to watch
reviews.comment: Or free online.  It is an enteresting story, well worth free, not nearly worth $5.  My biggest gripe is that this appears to be an hour or so long intense cartoon, broken up into 50 or so, 2 minute clips.  Too vain for my taste.
reviews.author: A Google User
